item.title: C++ is the new COBOL
item.description: C++ is a great language. As much as I hate it I cannot ignore how important it is and how much it brought to the table in it’s 36 years of existence. I have tremendous respect for Bjarne Stroustrup for creating the so-called C with classes and I personally think that it’s one of the best things that happened in programming language designs around the time when it came to existence.
